de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.model

Class TabSwitcherModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher.model.TabSwitcherModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model, Restorable, java.lang.Iterable<Tab>

    public class TabSwitcherModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Model, Restorable
    The model of a TabSwitcher.
    Since:
    0.1.0

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String REFERENCE_TAB_INDEX_EXTRA
      The name of the extra, which is used to store the index of the tab, which is used as a reference, when restoring the positions of tabs, within a bundle.
      static java.lang.String REFERENCE_TAB_POSITION_EXTRA
      The name of the extra, which is used to store the position of the tab, which is used as a reference, when restoring the positions of tabs, within a bundle.

      • addTab

        public final void addTab(@NonNull
                         Tab tab)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Adds a new tab to the tab switcher. By default, the tab is added at the end. If the switcher is currently shown, the tab is added by using an animation. By default, a SwipeAnimation with direction SwipeAnimation.SwipeDirection.RIGHT_OR_BOTTOM is used. If an animation is currently running, the tab will be added once all previously started animations have been finished.
        Specified by:
        addTab in interface Model
        Parameters:
        tab - The tab, which should be added, as an instance of the class Tab. The tab may not be null

      • addTab

        public final void addTab(@NonNull
                         Tab tab,
                         int index)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Adds a new tab to the tab switcher at a specific index. If the switcher is currently shown, the tab is added by using an animation. By default, a SwipeAnimation with direction SwipeAnimation.SwipeDirection.RIGHT_OR_BOTTOM is used. If an animation is currently running, the tab will be added once all previously started animations have been finished.
        Specified by:
        addTab in interface Model
        Parameters:
        tab - The tab, which should be added, as an instance of the class Tab. The tab may not be null
        index - The index, the tab should be added at, as an Integer value. The index must be at least 0 and at maximum getCount(), otherwise an IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown

      • addTab

        public final void addTab(@NonNull
                         Tab tab,
                         int index,
                         @NonNull
                         Animation animation)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Adds a new tab to the tab switcher at a specific index. If the switcher is currently shown, the tab is added by using a specific animation. If an animation is currently running, the tab will be added once all previously started animations have been finished.
        Specified by:
        addTab in interface Model
        Parameters:
        tab - The tab, which should be added, as an instance of the class Tab. The tab may not be null
        index - The index, the tab should be added at, as an Integer value. The index must be at least 0 and at maximum getCount(), otherwise an IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown
        animation - The animation, which should be used to add the tab, as an instance of the class Animation. The animation may not be null

      • addAllTabs

        public final void addAllTabs(@NonNull
                             java.util.Collection<? extends Tab> tabs)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Adds all tabs, which are contained by a collection, to the tab switcher. By default, the tabs are added at the end. If the switcher is currently shown, the tabs are added by using an animation. By default, a SwipeAnimation with direction SwipeAnimation.SwipeDirection.RIGHT_OR_BOTTOM is used. If an animation is currently running, the tabs will be added once all previously started animations have been finished.
        Specified by:
        addAllTabs in interface Model
        Parameters:
        tabs - A collection, which contains the tabs, which should be added, as an instance of the type Collection or an empty collection, if no tabs should be added

      • addAllTabs

        public final void addAllTabs(@NonNull
                             java.util.Collection<? extends Tab> tabs,
                             int index)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Adds all tabs, which are contained by a collection, to the tab switcher, starting at a specific index. If the switcher is currently shown, the tabs are added by using an animation. By default, a SwipeAnimation with direction SwipeAnimation.SwipeDirection.RIGHT_OR_BOTTOM is used. If an animation is currently running, the tabs will be added once all previously started animations have been finished.
        Specified by:
        addAllTabs in interface Model
        Parameters:
        tabs - A collection, which contains the tabs, which should be added, as an instance of the type Collection or an empty collection, if no tabs should be added
        index - The index, the first tab should be started at, as an Integer value. The index must be at least 0 and at maximum getCount(), otherwise an IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown

      • addAllTabs

        public final void addAllTabs(@NonNull
                             java.util.Collection<? extends Tab> tabs,
                             int index,
                             @NonNull
                             Animation animation)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Adds all tabs, which are contained by a collection, to the tab switcher, starting at a specific index. If the switcher is currently shown, the tabs are added by using a specific animation. If an animation is currently running, the tabs will be added once all previously started animations have been finished.
        Specified by:
        addAllTabs in interface Model
        Parameters:
        tabs - A collection, which contains the tabs, which should be added, as an instance of the type Collection or an empty collection, if no tabs should be added
        index - The index, the first tab should be started at, as an Integer value. The index must be at least 0 and at maximum getCount(), otherwise an IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown
        animation - The animation, which should be used to add the tabs, as an instance of the class Animation. The animation may not be null

        public final void addAllTabs(@NonNull
                             Tab[] tabs)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Adds all tabs, which are contained by an array, to the tab switcher. By default, the tabs are added at the end. If the switcher is currently shown, the tabs are added by using an animation. By default, a SwipeAnimation with direction SwipeAnimation.SwipeDirection.RIGHT_OR_BOTTOM is used. If an animation is currently running, the tabs will be added once all previously started animations have been finished.
        Specified by:
        addAllTabs in interface Model
        Parameters:
        tabs - An array, which contains the tabs, which should be added, as an array of the type Tab or an empty array, if no tabs should be added

      • addAllTabs

        public final void addAllTabs(@NonNull
                             Tab[] tabs,
                             int index)
        Description copied from interface: Model
        Adds all tabs, which are contained by an array, to the tab switcher, starting at a specific index. If the switcher is currently shown, the tabs are added by using an animation. By default, a SwipeAnimation with direction SwipeAnimation.SwipeDirection.RIGHT_OR_BOTTOM is used. If an animation is currently running, the tabs will be added once all previously started animations have been finished.
        Specified by:
        addAllTabs in interface Model
        Parameters:
        tabs - An array, which contains the tabs, which should be added, as an array of the type Tab or an empty array, if no tabs should be added
        index - The index, the first tab should be started at, as an Integer value. The index must be at least 0 and at maximum getCount(), otherwise an IndexOutOfBoundsException will be thrown

        True, if saved states of tabs are cleared when the corresponding tabs are removed from the tab switcher, false otherwise
